events.message: I received the wrong size for my recent order and would like to request a refund as I no longer want this product.
The issue has been identified as a refund request due to incorrect item size received by the customer.
Your case has been assigned to agent Sarah T. who will assist you further with the refund process.
Hello! This is Sarah from customer support. I'm here to help you with your refund for the incorrect item size you received.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so we can process your refund swiftly?
Sure, my order number is 4587321. I've attached a photo showing the size tag on the item that is incorrect.
Thank you for the information. We will initiate a full refund to your original payment method within 3 to 5 business days.
Great, thank you for handling this quickly. I appreciate the prompt refund confirmation.
The refund process has been completed successfully. Please let us know if you need any further assistance.
We are following up to confirm you have received your refund and if everything is satisfactory with your case closure.
Your refund case has now been officially closed. Thank you for your patience and please contact us anytime for future needs.
